replies.bodyText:
it seems that resource.remove() just removes the related file, while deleteTsFile method could also remove the TsFileResource from sequenceFileList/unSequenceFileList.
Does we need to reserve the TsFileResource when the TsFile is 0 byte length

replies.bodyText: If the tsfile length is 0. the resource should be removed from the resourceList, otherwise exception may occur in the query process
